title: 108_hr446
content: Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission (EMLIC) Act - Establishes the Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission, whose purpose is to examine the causes of soaring medical malpractice premiums and propose a comprehensive strategy to combat the consequences. Directs the Commission to investigate the possible linkage between: (1) skyrocketing malpractice insurance premiums, (2) rising jury awards, (3) decreased accessibility and affordability of health care. And (4) a rise in the number of physicians moving, quitting, or retiring.
